description: Journalists reporting for the BBC's Russian service are among those to lose their accreditation.
title: Belarus: Journalists covering protests stripped of accreditation
title_page: Belarus: Journalists covering protests stripped of accreditation - BBC News
maintext: "We believe it is vital for the people of Belarus to have access to impartial, independent information about events in their country. BBC Russian, which reaches more than five million people a week, has been a major source of news for people in Belarus and Russia during the post-election unrest," it said.
